official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the National Telecommunications and Information Administration for fiscal years 1986 and 1987, and for other purposes.

summary.text: NTIA Authorization Act of 1985 - Authorizes appropriations for the National Telecommunications and Information Administration for FY 1986 and 1987, including specified funds for an Office of Telecommunications Equipment and Services Marketing. Creates such Office to establish and maintain a program to monitor and assess existing and potential foreign markets for domestically produced telecommunications equipment and services.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the National Telecommunications and Information Administration for fiscal years 1986 and 1987, and for other purposes.
